TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataSourceViewSchemaConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 为表示数据源架构中的字段的属性提供一个类型转换器。

span.span: Provides a type converter for a property representing a field in a data source schema.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类在赋值前转换对象类型。Use the class to convert object types before assignment to a control property. 通常, 支持转换字符串对象类型, 并提供可用于分配给关联控件属性的标准值的列表。In general, the supports converting string object types and supplies a list of standard values available for assignment to the associated control property. 标准值集合是当前控件的数据源架构中的字段列表。The standard values collection is the list of fields in the data source schema for the current control. 若要支持转换其他对象类型, 请从派生一个类, 并重写其他对象类型的和方法。To support converting additional object types, derive a class from and override the and methods for the additional object types. 若要支持标准可赋值值的自定义列表, 请重写方法。To support a custom list of standard assignable values, override the method. 应用特性以将类指定为控件属性的类型转换器。 Apply the attribute to specify the class as the type converter for a control property. 例如, 类的属性 和类的属性都使用作为属性类型转换器。 For example, the property of the class and the property of the class use the as the property type converter. > [!NOTE] > 永远不应直接访问类型转换器。You should never access a type converter directly. 而应使用对象调用适当的转换器。Instead, call the appropriate converter by using a object. 有关详细信息, 请参阅中的示例。For more information, see the examples in . 方法指示转换器支持通过方法返回可用值的列表。 The method indicates that the converter supports returning a list of available values through the method. 方法指示列表不是可能值的独占列表。The method indicates that the list is not an exclusive list of possible values.

span.span: Design-Time Architecture

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 永远不应直接访问类型转换器。You should never access a type converter directly. 而应使用对象调用适当的转换器。Instead, call the appropriate converter by using a object. 有关详细信息, 请参阅中的示例。For more information, see the examples in .

span.span: Design-Time Architecture

summary.span: 指示指定的源类型是否可转换为关联控件属性的类型。

span.span: Indicates whether the specified source type can be converted to the type of the associated control property.

returns.span: 如果转换器能执行转换，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法以确定此方法是否支持转换源类型。 Call the method to determine whether the method supports converting the source type. 方法只可从字符串进行转换, 因此当是一个字符串时`sourceType` , 此方法将返回`true`。 The method can convert only from a string, so the method returns `true` when `sourceType` is a string.

span.span: Design-Time Architecture

summary.span: 将指定对象转换为关联控件属性的类型。

span.span: Converts the specified object to the type of the associated control property.

returns.span: 一个 实例，表示已转换的对象。

span.span: An instance that represents the converted object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`value`为字符串, 则返回的字符串`value`表示形式。If `value` is a string, then the string representation of `value` is returned. 如果`value` 为`null`, 则返回空字符串 ("")。If `value` is `null`, an empty string ("") is returned. 对于所有其他指定值, 将引发异常。For all other specified values, a exception is thrown. 调用方法以确定此方法是否支持转换源类型。 Call the method to determine whether the method supports converting the source type.

span.span: The conversion could not be performed.
Design-Time Architecture

summary.span: 返回可以分配给控件属性的可用值的列表。

span.span: Returns a list of available values that can be assigned to a control property.
Design-Time Architecture

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection GetStandardValues (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context);

param.span: 可用于获取附加上下文信息的 实现。

span.span: An implementation that can be used to gain additional context information.

summary.span: 返回可以分配给关联控件属性的可用值的列表。

span.span: Returns a list of available values that can be assigned to the associated control property.

returns.span: 一个 ，包含可以分配给关联控件属性的值。

span.span: A containing available values for assignment to the associated control property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用 指定`context`的对象的属性来获取实现。 The method uses the property of the specified `context` object to obtain an implementation. 如果实现可用, 它将用于在设计时访问关联控件的数据源架构, 并从关联的数据源架构视图中检索可用字段列表。If the implementation is available, it is used to access the data source schema for the associated control at design time and retrieve the list of available fields from the associated data source schema view. 可用值的集合是从关联控件的数据源架构中的字段生成的。The collection of available values is built from the fields in the data source schema for the associated control.

span.span: Design-Time Architecture

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的`false`方法, 指示方法返回的列表不是所有可能可赋值值的独占列表。 The method for a returns `false`, indicating that the list returned by the method is not an exclusive list of all possible assignable values.

span.span: Design-Time Architecture

summary.span: 指示在指定的上下文内，此转换器是否返回一组可以分配给控件属性的值。

span.span: Indicates whether this converter returns a set of available values for assignment to a control property within the specified context.

returns.span: 如果此转换器返回一组可以分配给关联控件属性的值，则返回 ；否则返回 。

span.span: if this converter returns a standard set of available values for assignment to the associated control property; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法指示转换器是否支持通过方法返回可用值的列表。 The method indicates whether the converter supports returning a list of available values through the method. 如果指定 `true` 的对象在其属性中提供了实现, 则对象的方法将返回。 `context`The method for the object returns `true` if the specified `context` object supplies an implementation in its property. 方法使用实现来检索关联数据源架构中的可用字段列表。The method uses the implementation to retrieve the list of available fields from the associated data source schema.

span.span: Design-Time Architecture
